title: Did we pull the plug on virtual school too soon?
description:
Students and teachers are returning to classrooms after more than a year of virtual learning, but going back to school doesn’t mean going back to normal. Vox’s Anna North (@annanorthtweets) joins Recode Daily to break down how schools are preparing. 

References: 
Read Anna’s story here

itunes:subtitle: With the continuing threat of the delta variant, is now the best time to return to the classroom?
